appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{"components":[{"title":"Introduction","theme":"info","collapsible":false,"hideLabel":true,"key":"introduction","type":"panel","label":"Panel","input":false,"tableView":false,"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Telco Churn EDA App

TC

Telco Churn EDA App

This Application can be used to visualize distribution and relation between various features and to predict churn using classification model. Once customers who are likely to churn has been identified it would act as the trigger point for Customer Retention Program initiation.

Key Features

    +
  • Profiling and Exploratory Data Analysis of Transaction data: User can get insight into the dataset. Data Profiling would display null values present in each column, summary statistics of data and so on. User would be presented with the graphs depicting the distribution of data.
    • +
  • Flexible Data Filtering: Allows analysis across different geographical regions or focuses on a specific state, international plan, and voicemail plan.
    • +
  • Summary Statistics: Provides a comprehensive overview of key metrics like call minutes, charges, and customer interactions using aggregation functions.
    • +
  • Correlation Analysis: Identifies how service usage metrics and plan features correlate with each other and with the churn status.
    • +
  • Visualization for Churn Analysis: Includes pie charts, box plots, and count plots to visualize churn distribution and service usage patterns.
    • +
  • Grouped Data Analysis: Compares total charges for different times of day and international calls, grouped by whether customers churned or not.

Key Insights

    +
  • Identification of customers likely to churn would help business to initiate customer retention program.
    • +
  • Better insight into Churning pattern would help business to avoid it in future.
    • +
  • It would also lead to enhanced customer satisfaction through better retention management.
